oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Novel cantilever for biosensing applications
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KARHADE, OG
CHILUVERU, SS
APTE, PR
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: biosensors
microsensors
molecular biophysics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper, we propose a novel microcantilever for biosensing applications, which we call a segmented cantilever. The aim of this paper is to show that the proposed design minimizes the disadvantages of the currently used micro-cantilevers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Proceedings of the IEEE Conference and Workshop Advanced Semiconductor Manufacturing, Boston, USA, 4-6 May 2004, 409- 412
